long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DUPLICATE TAB DETECTOR: This open source extension helps manage your browsing by alerting you when you’re about to open a tab that’s already open. Originally inspired by my habit of opening the same links from emails or Slack, it efficiently closes new duplicate tabs, keeping the browser tidy and uncluttered.
